history.proof: intros a. unfold is_gcd. split. - apply gcd_sym. hauto q: on depth: 3use: divides_refl, gcd_zero. - intros d. intros [cd_d cd_dd]. sfirstorder depth: 3use: divides_refl, gcd_zero.

exceptions.exn: In environment a : nat Unable to unify "is_cd ?M1426 0 ?M1426 /\\ (forall d' : nat, is_cd d' 0 ?M1426 -> divides ?M1426 d')" with "is_cd 1 a 1 /\\ (forall d' : nat, is_cd d' a 1 -> divides 1 d')".
Wrong bullet -: Current bullet - is not finished.
In environment a, d : nat cd_d : divides 1 d cd_dd : divides a d Unable to unify "divides a d" with "divides 1 d".
In environment a, d : nat cd_d : divides 1 d cd_dd : divides a d Unable to unify "d" with "1".

original: intros a. unfold is_gcd. split. - apply gcd_sym. apply gcd_zero. - intros d. intros [cd_d cd_dd]. apply cd_dd. apply divides_refl.
